title: What kind of movie character are you?

options.text: I face it head-on.
I try to find a diplomatic solution.
I avoid it if I can.
I think through every possible outcome first.

questions.question: What would be your ideal weekend activity?

options.text: Exploring a new place or trying something adventurous
Spending quality time with close friends and family
Reading a book or working on a personal project
Attending a big social gathering or party
My bravery
My intelligence
My kindness
My loyalty

questions.question: How would your friends describe you?

options.text: Resourceful and clever
Warm and compassionate
Ambitious and driven
Fun and spontaneous

questions.question: If you were in a team, what role would you take?

options.text: The leader
The strategist
The supporter
The one keeping things light-hearted

questions.question: What's your approach to new challenges?

options.text: Bring it onâ€”I'm ready for anything!
Think it through and make a plan
Help others who are also facing challenges
Find creative or unconventional solutions

questions.question: Which place feels most like home to you?

options.text: A bustling city with lots of energy
A quiet town with friendly neighbors
A peaceful, natural environment
Anywhere as long as I'm with people I care about

questions.question: What would you do if you found a lost treasure?

options.text: Keep it and use it to help myself and others
Donate it to a museum or an important cause
Split it with friends and family
Hide it in a secret spot and keep it safe

result_logic.Hero: You are a natural leader, brave and determined like Indiana Jones.
result_logic.Sage: You are wise and thoughtful, with traits like Yoda or Hermione Granger.
result_logic.Caregiver: You are warm and supportive, similar to Samwise Gamgee from Lord of the Rings.
result_logic.Explorer: You are curious and adventurous, like Lara Croft or Peter Pan.
